comment.author: Kelsey
comment.text: The CLINTON'S are very good at silencing those who oppose them, check out their long history of crimes before you vote for the real criminal, HILLARY.

replies.text: Laura you say Hillary has bigger hands than Trump, well we might as well add she has a bigger MOUTH than Trump. Because nothing but BIG lies come from that MOUTH OF HER'S!!!
